name: Keltis
description:
Follow the intricate paths of the celtic stones in an exciting race for the highest score.

Play numbered cards to move your figures as far as possible along the colored paths of stone, collect as many wishing stones and bonus points as possible on your way to beat your opponents!

A clever strategy with the use of your cards, tiles and paths with some luck of the draw leads to victory. Play as many cards as possible in the right order - but never lose track of your opponents' tactics!

This faithful adaptation of the original Keltis boardgame includes the first path of the solitaire mode "Keltis Campaign" which offers a challenging single player experience with increasing difficulty.

But thats not all: The three remaining paths of the campaign can be unlocked via In App Purchase.
The expansion set "New Challenges" is also available for download as an App purchase directly from the game. Its a completely new board layout with AI controlled opponents for hours of challenging fun.


Features:

- Three difficulty settings for beginners and experts
- Easy rules based on the original board game
- Comprehensive tutorial
- Local multiplayer-mode (hot seat) for up to 4 players
- Online multiplayer via Game Center (NEW in version 1.5)
- English and German language supported
- Three additional paths of the "Keltis Campaign" available as In App Purchase
- Expansion "New Challenges" available as In App Purchase
